thread.title: Sault man claims $10K in Rotary's December draw
thread.title_full: Sault man claims $10K in Rotary's December draw

author: SooToday Staff
title: Sault man claims $10K in Rotary's December draw
text:
Jim Steele is $10,000 richer after claiming the cash prize in the Rotary Club of Sault Ste. Marie North's Trip of the Month draw for December.
Rotary has been using the fundraiser for more than 15 years to provide money for youth programs that encourage the development of mental and physical well-being. The draw consists of 11 trips for January to November and one $10,000 draw in December in lieu of travel. There are also two draws of $150 each month.
Following is a complete list of 2023 winners. There are still limited tickets available for the 2024 Trip of The Month draws and interested parties should email
[[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#22564d564f625143574e564c4d50564a504d5643505b0c4143) to reserve tickets.
TRAVEL WINNERS:
- January Jamie and Don Errington Amsterdam, Holland
- February Brian Bertolo Orlando, Florida
- March Denis Gregoire Bahamas Cruise
- April Mark Lepore Vancouver/Victoria, B.C.
- May Caroline Dukes Caya Coco, Cuba
- June Pat and Cathy Kelly Barcelona, Spain
- July Vince Assiginack Costa Rica
- August Rony DalCin Nassau, Bahamas
- September Jane Parniak Dublin, Ireland
- October Serge Viau Cancun, Mexico
- November Randi Siitse Glasgow, Scotland
DECEMBER CASH WINNER OF $10,000 was Jim Steele
CASH WINNERS OF $150 each were:
- Art & Barb Morgan
